On the Wednesday edition of Breitbart News Daily, broadcast live on SiriusXM Patriot Channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM Eastern, Breitbart Executive Chairman Stephen K. Bannon will discuss President Obama’s address at the memorial service for the fallen Dallas police officers, as well as the continued chaos from anti-police demonstrations across the nation.

Frank Gaffney of the Center for Security Policy and Richard Berman of Berman and Company will discuss China’s reaction to the decision against its territorial claims in the South China Sea by the Permanent Court of Arbitration at The Hague.
Breitbart Legal Editor Ken Klukowski will report live from Cleveland about the Rules, Platform, RNC Meeting taking place this week in anticipation of the RNC Convention next week.

SiriusXM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
Breitbart’s Lee Stranahan will report live from Baton Rouge, Louisiana, about a plot to kill Baton Rouge police officers.
Live from London, Rome, and Jerusalem, Breitbart correspondents will provide updates on the latest international news.
Breitbart News Daily is the first live, conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week.
Listeners may call into the show at: 866-957-2874.
